title: SaladStop - Great World City
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Western, Salad bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Quick service salad bar chain restaurant offering create-your-own salads. Choose from 30+ toppings which include alfalfa, brown rice, beans, tofu, nuts, and more. Ask the staff to use a fresh chopping board.
streetAddress: 1 Kim Seng Promenade, 01-21A, Great World City
